class="Footer_footer-bottom-content-part__RXmA3"><div class="HtmlContent_html-content-container__Ow2Bk "><p>All emoji names&nbsp;are&nbsp;<a href="/faq/">official Unicode Character Database&nbsp;or CLDR names</a>.&nbsp;<a href="/emoji/" title="😃 Every Emoji by Codepoint">Code points</a>&nbsp;listed are part of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unicode_Standard">Unicode Standard</a>.</p>

Black Heart","code":"❤️","slug":"red-heart","description":"\u003cp\u003eA classic red love heart emoji.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThe red heart ideograph\u0026nbsp;is traditionally used for expressions of love and romance across many cultures, with this being amongst the most frequence use cases for this emoji.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eHowever, the Red Heart emoji is also often used to express non-romantic positive sentiments, in part thanks to its use as one of the default reaction emoji options across many social messaging platforms (e.g. \u003ca href=\"/instagram\"\u003eInstagram\u003c/a\u003e, \u003ca href=\"/slack\"\u003eSlack\u003c/a\u003e, \u003ca href=\"/whatsapp\"\u003eWhatsApp\u003c/a\u003e).\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eThis is historically\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://blog.emojipedia.org/what-every-heart-emoji-really-means/\"\u003ethe most popular heart emoji\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;by a considerable distance and is amongst the most popular emojis of all time.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eA similar\u0026nbsp;emoji exists\u0026nbsp;for the\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"/heart-suit/\" title=\"♥️️ Heart Suit\"\u003eheart suit\u003c/a\u003e in a deck of playing cards.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eOn \u003ca href=\"/snapchat/\" title=\"👻 Snapchat Emoji Meanings\"\u003eSnapchat\u003c/a\u003e, this emoji displays next to a friend\u0026nbsp;when you have been #1 BFs with each other for two consecutive weeks.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eNote: the Unicode Character Database (UCD)\u0026nbsp;name \u0026ldquo;Heavy Black Heart\u0026rdquo;\u0026nbsp;pre-dates color emoji, when the term referred to a solid, black ❤︎ heart character. See the glossary for information on the term\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"/glossary/#black\" title=\"📖 Glossary\"\u003eblack\u003c/a\u003e in historic Unicode character names.\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e","currentCldrName":"Red Heart"},{"title":"White Heavy Check Mark","code":"✅","slug":"check-mark-button","description":"\u003cp\u003eA \u003ca href=\"/check-mark/\" title=\"✔️ Heavy Check Mark\"\u003echeck mark\u003c/a\u003e that displays with a white outlined appearance. Shows\u0026nbsp;on most platforms with a bright green rounded rectangle or circle surrounding it.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAndroid \u003ca href=\"/google/android-4.4/check-mark-button/\" title=\"✅ White Heavy Check Mark on Google Android 4.4\"\u003epreviously\u003c/a\u003e displayed this as an outlined blue check mark / blue tick.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cem\u003eThis emoji is not supported in Twitter / X names, possibly in an attempt to minimize confusion with a verified checkmark.\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e","currentCldrName":"Check Mark Button"},{"title":"Sparkles","code":"✨","slug":"sparkles","description":"\u003cp\u003eThe glittering flashes of sparkles. One of the world\u0026#39;s most popular emojis, it is generally depicted as a cluster of three, yellow\u0026nbsp;four-point stars, with one large sparkle and two small ones to its left or right.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eCommonly used to indicate various positive sentiments, including love, happiness, beauty, gratitude, and excitement, as well as\u0026nbsp;newness or cleanliness.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eMay also be used as \u003ca href=\"https://blog.emojipedia.org/its-not-just-you-the-sparkles-emoji-is-everywhere/\"\u003ea form of ✨emphasis✨ or to convey sarcastic or mocking tones\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAs of late 2023, an icon similar to the sparkles emoji is also often used within tech platforms to represent a feature that utilizes\u0026nbsp;artificial intelligence.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eBoth \u003ca href=\"/microsoft/windows-10-anniversary-update/sparkles/\"\u003eMicrosoft\u003c/a\u003e and\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"/twitter/twemoji-1.0/sparkles/\"\u003eTwitter\u0026rsquo;s\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;sparkles were\u0026nbsp;previously\u0026nbsp;multicolored, while\u0026nbsp;Samsung\u0026rsquo;s sparkles were previously depicted on a night sky, suggesting \u003ca href=\"/sparkler/\"\u003efirework sparklers\u003c/a\u003e.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003ca href=\"http://twitter.com/Twitter/status/1075074100412985345\"\u003eTwitter\u0026#39;s mobile app uses\u003c/a\u003e ✨ Sparkles as a button users can tap to toggle between latest and top tweets on their timeline.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eSimilar emojis\u0026nbsp;with less implied meaning on fire. Depicted as a red, orange, and yellow flickering flame.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eCommonly used for various metaphorical expressions related to fire, including the slang \u003cem\u003ehot\u003c/em\u003e (\u0026ldquo;attractive\u0026rdquo;) and \u003ca href=\"https://www.dictionary.com/e/slang/its-lit/\"\u003e\u003ci\u003elit\u003c/i\u003e\u003c/a\u003e (\u0026ldquo;excellent\u0026rdquo;).\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003ca href=\"/snapchat/\"\u003eSnapchat\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;displays\u0026nbsp;🔥 Fire\u0026nbsp;next to two users who are on a\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003esnapstreak\u003c/em\u003e, or have been messaging for more than three consecutive days.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e","currentCldrName":"Fire"},{"title":"Smiling Face with Smiling Eyes","code":"😊","slug":"smiling-face-with-smiling-eyes","description":"\u003cp\u003eA yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, closed smile turning up to rosy cheeks. Often expresses genuine happiness and warm, positive feelings.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAn emoji form of the ^^ emoticon.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eOn\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"/snapchat/\"\u003eSnapchat\u003c/a\u003e, this emoji next to a contact denotes that you message that\u0026nbsp;person often but they aren\u0026#39;t your\u0026nbsp;\u003cem\u003e#1 Best Friend\u003c/em\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e","currentCldrName":"Smiling Face with Smiling Eyes"},{"title":"Skull","code":"💀","slug":"skull","description":"\u003cp\u003eA whitish-gray, cartoon-styled human skull with large, black eye sockets. Commonly expresses figurative death, e.g., \u003ci\u003edying\u003c/i\u003e from extreme laughter, frustration, or affection.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003ePopular around \u003ca href=\"/halloween/\"\u003eHalloween\u003c/a\u003e. Not to be confused with \u003ca href=\"/skull-and-crossbones/\"\u003e☠️\u0026nbsp;Skull and Crossbones\u003c/a\u003e, though their applications may overlap.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eAvailable as an Apple\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"/animoji/\"\u003eAnimoji\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e","currentCldrName":"Skull"},{"title":"Loudly Crying Face","code":"😭","slug":"loudly-crying-face","description":"\u003cp\u003eA yellow face with an open mouth wailing and streams of heavy tears flowing from closed eyes. May convey inconsolable grief\u0026nbsp;but also other intense feelings, such as uncontrollable laughter, pride or overwhelming joy.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eIn March 2021,\u0026nbsp;😭\u0026nbsp;Loudly Crying Face became\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"https://blog.emojipedia.org/loudly-crying-becomes-top-tier-emoji/\"\u003ethe most popular emoji on Twitter\u003c/a\u003e. It held this position until January 2022, when\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"/face-with-tears-of-joy/\"\u003e😂 Face with Tears of Joy\u003c/a\u003e \u003ca href=\"https://blog.emojipedia.org/tears-of-joy-just-about-returns-as-twitters-top-emoji/\"\u003ereturned as the top emoji on the platform\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e","currentCldrName":"Loudly Crying Face"},{"title":"Face with Tears of Joy","code":"😂","slug":"face-with-tears-of-joy","description":"\u003cp\u003eA yellow face with a big\u0026nbsp;grin, uplifted eyebrows, and smiling eyes, each shedding a tear from laughing so hard. Widely used to show something is funny or pleasing.\u0026nbsp;\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eNamed the Oxford Dictionaries 2015 \u003ca href=\"https://languages.oup.com/word-of-the-year/2015/\"\u003eWord of the Year\u003c/a\u003e, and the most used emoji on all platforms \u003ca href=\"https://blog.emojipedia.org/loudly-crying-becomes-top-tier-emoji/\"\u003efrom 2011-2021\u003c/a\u003e. Briefly \u003ca href=\"https://blog.emojipedia.org/loudly-crying-becomes-top-tier-emoji/\"\u003eovertaken\u003c/a\u003e as the top emoji on \u003ca href=\"/twitter/\"\u003eTwitter\u003c/a\u003e in 2021 by\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"/loudly-crying-face/\"\u003e😭 Loudly Crying Face\u003c/a\u003e, though as of January 2022 it has \u003ca href=\"https://blog.emojipedia.org/tears-of-joy-just-about-returns-as-twitters-top-emoji/\"\u003ereclaimed its top position on the platform\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eSee also:\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"/rolling-on-the-floor-laughing/\"\u003e🤣\u0026nbsp;Rolling on the Floor Laughing\u003c/a\u003e\u0026nbsp;which expresses more intense laughter;\u0026nbsp;or cat\u0026nbsp;variant:\u0026nbsp;\u003ca href=\"/cat-with-tears-of-joy/\"\u003e😹\u0026nbsp;Cat Face With Tears of Joy\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cdiv id=\"professor_prebid-root\"\u003e\u0026nbsp;\u003c/div\u003e","currentCldrName":"Face with Tears of Joy"},{"title":"White Medium Star","code":"⭐","slug":"star","description":"\u003cp\u003eA classic, five-point gold star.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eCommonly used for various metaphorical senses of star (e.g., for fame, success, excellence, reviews). Also used for emphasis or flair. Occasionally used for astronomical stars.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eNot to be confused with \u003ca href=\"/dizzy/\"\u003e💫 Dizzy\u003c/a\u003e, \u003ca href=\"/glowing-star/\"\u003e🌟 Glowing Star\u003c/a\u003e, \u003ca href=\"/shooting-star/\"\u003e🌠 Shooting Star\u003c/a\u003e, or \u003ca href=\"/sparkles/\"\u003e✨ Sparkles\u003c/a\u003e, though their applications may overlap.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003e\u003ca href=\"/samsung/touchwiz-7.1/star/\"\u003eSamsung\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"/facebook/1.0/star/\"\u003eFacebook\u0026rsquo;s\u003c/a\u003e stars were once silver.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\r\n\u003cp\u003eSee the glossary for the term \u003ca href=\"/glossary/#white\"\u003e\u003ci\u003ewhite\u003c/i\u003e\u003c/a\u003e in Unicode character
